comments.body: marking this deprecated actually omits it from the help, which means the fact that it is enabled by default and you need to "Set to zero to disable." is invisible to the end user. That is not good.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +106,110 @@		"the cluster and that port 443 on the cluster's public address is proxied to this "+
		"port. This is performed by nginx in the default setup. Set to zero to disable.")
	fs.MarkDeprecated("insecure-port", "This flag will be removed in a future version.")
}
